tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockHealthRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    health_record VARCHAR,
    breeding_info VARCHAR,
    vaccination_schedule VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE VaccinationSchedules (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT NOT NULL,
    vaccination_date DATE NOT NULL,
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    next_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    livestock_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    breed VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE livestock_health_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_id INT,
  health_status VARCHAR(50),
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE breeding_information (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_id INT,
  breeding_date DATE,
  breeding_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vaccination_schedules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_id INT,
  vaccine_name VARCHAR(50),
  vaccine_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE livestock (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_type VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  weight DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE owners (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  email VARCHAR(50)
)
